metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12869 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The multiauth module in SimpleSAMLphp 1.14.13 and earlier allows remote attackers to bypass authentication context restrictions and use an authentication source defined in config/authsources.php via vectors related to improper validation of user input.

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
